page.title: 15EMPOLYMENT
page.content: The most common employment in{CHELFORD is farming.The other major industry is quarrying.There is other employment in the area like shops such as general stores,sweet shop and newsagent,post office,a butchers,a hairdressers and the Dixon Arms, which is a public house and restaurant.There is a farm supplies and a small branch of the NatWest bank.There are 2 garages in Chelford which both mend and sell cars as well as selling fuel. For 3 days, there is a cattle market, including a snack bar and Halifax Building Society branch office. The Railway Station is manned at times by 1 or 2 men. Outside the main village area(A537),there is a school(8 full or part time employees), a church,a lawn mower suppliers and a joint insurance and coal merchants. There are other cottage industries. Much employment is part-time.
